DOC.criteria: Inclusion : We include ED patient present acutely painful ankle sprain NSAIDs constitute standard care pain management . The follow exclude : Those laceration , bite , burn head trauma pregnant anyone preexist chronic pain condition inflammatory intestinal disorder Crohn 's disease ulcerative colitis anyone regularly use another NSAID anticoagulation medication anyone experience asthma NSAID use compromise cognitive ability significant comorbidity compromise participation joint replacement know hypersensitivity diclofenac allergic response NSAIDs class active stomach and/or duodenal ulceration gastrointestinal bleed anyone admit severe active bleeding recent heart surgery severe liver renal insufficiency prisoner mentally disabled patient ward state cognitive decisional impairment
